article_title: Financial Advice In The Age Of AI And Long Life
article_text: Ric Edelman is one the top financial advisors in the U.S.. His firm, Edelman Financial Services, has 41 offices across the country. And he thinks, all things constant, most financial advisors as we’ve known them won’t be around much longer.

article_summary:
Ric Edelman is one the top financial advisors in the U.S.. His firm, Edelman Financial Services, has 41 offices across the country.
And he thinks, all things constant, most financial advisors as we’ve known them won’t be around much longer.
